content.text: 4 (1.55 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bar, broken into rectangles
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "4 (1.55 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bar, broken into rectangles" )

content.text: 0) In a mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cream"@21:26 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "butter"@27:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "brown sugar"@38:49 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a mixing bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add egg yolk and vanilla; mix well.
2) Combine flour and salt; add to creamed mixture.
4) Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "15-18 minutes"@29:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until golden brown"@46:64 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Immediately place candy bar pieces over crust.
6) Let stand for 1 minute or until softened; spread chocolate evenly.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "spread"@45:51 / AC
		:ppt ( "chocolate"@52:61 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "stand"@7:12 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "1 minute"@17:25 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until softened"@29:43 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
